document_data.name: K'Thoutek
document_data.mainbody: '''K'Thoutek''' was a large comet (300 miles diameter) in [[Realmspace]] that circumnavigated [[the sun]] in an extremely elliptical orbit.
document_data.Inhabitants: Its only remaining inhabitant of a once large group of [[oortling]]s was their greatest [[wizard]], turned into an [[undead]] [[haunt]] bent on revenge against the [[illithid]]s who destroyed the colony. The appearance of the comet K'Thoutek was seen as a sign for the birth of a powerful person by astronomers on [[Toril]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The appearance of K'Thoutek in the Torilian sky produced a variety of predictions by astrologers, usually associated with the coming of a powerful entity. If K'thoutek was seen in the vicinity of a [[:Category:Nebulae|nebula]], the entity was said to be evil. The first sighting of comet was said to have predicted the birth of [[Elminster]], while the following sighting several orbital periods later, when the comet was about to enter the [[Galleon Nebula]], was said to have predicted the birth of the [[Simbul]].
